name: Environmentally-related illness and injury surveillance
text:
ENVIRONMENTALLY-RELATED ILLNESS AND INJURY

 []    The department of health shall maintain, as it deems advisable and within available resources, an environmentally-related human illness and injury surveillance system for conditions determined by the director to present a threat to public health in order to ascertain the incidence, distribution, and other epidemiological characteristics of these illnesses and injuries. [L 1987, c 186, pt of §2]
